author: mmusich
body:
backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47858

#### PR description:

This is a continuation / follow-up of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47492 (see https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47491#issuecomment-2706895784).
In particular, it moves era from `Run3` \ `Run3_2024` to few selected online DQM clients that seem to be relevant to update given the current content of the 2025 Era definition:

https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/5b3c0da1e2ded544e9c4ed7596f920c4a08fe09f/Configuration/Eras/python/Era_Run3_2025_cff.py#L3-L9

(I am not sure if the ECAL client should be updated too).

#### PR validation:

`scram b runtests use-ibeos` runs fine. Requires testing at P5.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Verbatim backport of https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47858 to the 2025 data-taking release.
title: [15.0.X] change era to Run3_2025 in a selected online DQM clients
